--show-console=false.Description: If true, print the current server"s web console URL

-c.Description: Print the current user context name

--show-context=false.Description: Print the current user context name

--show-server=false.Description: If true, print the current server"s REST API URL

-t.Description: Print the token the current session is using. This will return an error if you are using a different form of authentication.

--show-token=false.Description: Print the token the current session is using. This will return an error if you are using a different form of authentication.
